name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take Me To Just The Recipe

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get just the recipe from a recipe website by opening it in justtherecipe.app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get just the recipe from a recipe website.

Credit for justtherecipe.app goes to Reddit user doppio: https://www.reddit.com/user/doppio. This extension just opens the current page on justtherecipe.app.

I'm not affiliated with the creator of justtherecipe.app, just wanted an easy way to access the excellent website.

Icons made by Freepik (https://www.freepik.com) from www.flaticon.com. Screenshots are from smittenkitchen.com and justtherecipe.app.
